    level="1"

>
[Relentless Disarm](/Feats.aspx?ID=1157) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad](/Sources.aspx?ID=14) pg. 81

**Archetype** [Zephyr Guard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=35)

**Prerequisites**
[Zephyr Guard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1154); Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

When you succeed, but don’t critically succeed, at a check to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a creature, your circumstance bonus to further checks to Disarm that creature is +4 instead of +2. Other creatures gain only the normal bonus.

 When you critically succeed at a Disarm check, you can immediately [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) your target as a reaction.
name: Relentless Disarm
prerequisite: Zephyr Guard Dedication; Trained in Athletics
